content: if you re looking for a crochet project that s relaxing beginner-friendly and makes a big impact this one big granny square blanket is just the thing made from a single ever-growing granny square this pattern takes all the charm of traditional granny squares and makes it more exciting it s literally just one oversized granny square -------------------------- you will receive -------------------------- 1 pdf digital download file for one big granny square blanket crochet pattern instant download as soon as payment clears ravelry s system written in english and u s crochet terms ---------------- yarn used ---------------- 100% cotton worsted weight #4 ------------------------------------- finished measurements ------------------------------------- 30 w x 30 h adjustable ----------------- skill level ----------------- beginner ---------- notes ---------- ~gauge is included in this pattern ~this pattern has been checked for accuracy although this has been tested please note that small errors can still slip by i am happy to assist if you need any help ~this is a free pattern on my blog but you can also purchase this listing for the ad-free downloadable pdf version ----------------------- downloading ----------------------- ~download instructions~ go to my notebook and find the pattern image for this purchase and a download link will accompany it i cannot email patterns to you ------------------------ where to print ------------------------ ~ home printer ~ local copy store - for example staples office depot etc ~ local professional printer ~ online print vendor --------------------- terms of use --------------------- © 2025 sonya blackstone do not sell share or modify this pattern you may sell items you make with this pattern this pattern as with all blackstone designs/sonya blackstone patterns are not for educational use without written permission from the designer online users please link to me when sharing your creations all rights reserved www facebook com/sblackstonedesigns www instagram com/blackstone_designs ------------------------ all sales final ------------------------ due to the nature of digital files they cannot be returned so no exchanges or refunds will be given ------------------------------- ravelry shop coupons ------------------------------- purchase any 3 single patterns & receive 20% off use coupon code save20now purchase any 4 single patterns & receive 25% off use coupon code save25now purchase any 5 single patterns & receive 30% off use coupon code save30now thank you for visiting
